title: Add mailto email button to Contact section

requirements.summary: Add a prominent 'Email Me' button to the Contact section that opens the visitor's default email client pre-addressed to pranaavsanjith@gmail.com using a mailto: link, styled consistently with the existing midnight-violet dark theme
acceptanceCriteria: An 'Email Me' button or link is visible in the Contact section
Clicking the button opens the user's default email client with the To field pre-filled as pranaavsanjith@gmail.com
The button uses a mailto:pranaavsanjith@gmail.com href
The button styling is consistent with the existing dark midnight-violet theme (colors, typography, border radius)
The button is accessible and works on both desktop and mobile

file_operations.description: Add an 'Email Me' button or link element with href='mailto:pranaavsanjith@gmail.com' in the contact info section. Position it prominently near the existing email display and social links. Style the button using the existing midnight-violet theme classes (bg-violet-500/10, hover:bg-violet-500/20, text-violet-300, border-violet-500/30) to match the portfolio's design system. Ensure the button includes appropriate aria-label for accessibility and uses Mail icon from lucide-react for visual consistency with other contact elements.
